content: After jumping down from the cliff at the end of Woods of Ember, you'll land in the waters at the start of Furnace Valley. Immediately turn to the right, to pick up the first green Wisp in the region.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Furnace Valley Walkthrough'.
The content is as follows:
After jumping down from the cliff at the end of Woods of Ember, you'll land in the waters at the start of Furnace Valley. Immediately turn to the right, to pick up the first green Wisp in the region.
